#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        if(n<3)
        {
            cout<<(4*n*(4*n-1)*(4*n-2))/6<<endl;
        }
        else
        {
            cout<<(4*n*((4*n-1)*(4*n-2)-(n-1)*(n-2)))/6<<endl;
        }
    }
}
